    PixelConverter - Class in se.kth.saeedvan.image_processor.utils
    Static methods for conversions between an int representing ARGB-values and the separate parts alpha, red, green and blue.

    processImage(int[][]) - Method in class se.kth.saeedvan.image_processor.model.Blur
    This method calculates the average value for red, green and blue of the nearest eight pixels for each pixel inclusive the pixel itself and set each pixel value to that average value.
    processImage(int[][]) - Method in class se.kth.saeedvan.image_processor.model.GrayScale
    Converts each pixel in the original pixel matrix to grayscale by averaging its RGB components.
    processImage(int[][]) - Method in class se.kth.saeedvan.image_processor.model.InvertColors
    This method subtracts each RGB component for each pixel from its max value 255.
